html:
386 U.S. 684

87 S.Ct. 1325

18 L.Ed.2d 405

MILLER BREWING CO.
v.
Theodore JONES.

No. 1067.

Supreme Court of the United States

April 17, 1967

Rehearing Denied May 29, 1967.

See 387 U.S. 938, 87 S.Ct. 2048.

Frank H. Uriell and Paul A. Teschner, for appellant.

William G. Clark, Atty. Gen. of Illinois, and Richard A. Michael and John J. O'Toole, Asst. Attys. Gen., for appellee.

PER CURIAM.

1

The motion to dismiss is granted and the appeal is dismissed for want of a substantial federal question.

v.
JONES, DIRECTOR OF REVENUE OF ILLINOIS.

No. 1067.

Supreme Court of United States.

APPEAL FROM THE SUPREME COURT OF ILLINOIS.

Frank H. Uriell and Paul A. Teschner for appellant.

PER CURIAM.

The motion to dismiss is granted and the appeal is dismissed for want of a substantial federal question.
